file_content.text: It's good to know the Exchange won't be reporting on my every message home.
The Exchange won't be spying on you again.
Probably untrue, but at least they won't be able to use the same tricks.
Thank you all.
Thank you, my lord.
Thank you.
According to the tracer you planted, it's Hutts paying for information against us. High Command will have a lot to say about that.
I hope this covers any expenses you may have incurred.
The coordinates for the uplink towers should be in your datapad.
Ah! And I thought they weren't taking my reports seriously.
But here they are, sending a group of the Empire's most storied defenders....
But here they are, sending me a Sith Lord to handle the problem.
But here they are, teaming me up with one of the Intelligence Minister's best.
But here they are, hiring one of the galaxy's top bounty hunters.
But here they are, sending me one of the Empire's best.
I guess the Exchange spying on us really gets High Command's regulation briefs in a twist, huh?
I'm afraid I don't understand.
Didn't High Command brief you? I told them I needed advanced operatives capable of targeting strikes against Exchange spies in public locales.
Nobody sent me here.
I haven't been hired.
Stop talking nonsense!
Then you... weren't sent by High Command? I requested advanced operatives who could perform targeted strikes against Exchange spies in public locations.
They're using satellite uplinks to get into our databases. Advanced stuff for them. We're guessing the Republic or someone is backing them.
We need to get the codes they're using, sabotage their connections and find out who they're forwarding the intel to.
I'll deal with this.
What are you offering?
I can arrange a payment, yes. Does that mean you'll take the job?
Spell out what you need.
The Exchange has taken over a number of satellite uplink towers. I'll transmit a file with which ones.
You need to get the codes for the uplink towers from their people on-site, then use them to sabotage the links.
Best-case scenario, you also plant this tracer so our techs can track who the information is being fed to. Thanks for helping us out.
I'm not needed. [Refuse quest]
I guess I should send a second alert....
Our goals here would be better accomplished had we wiped out the native life before landing....
